mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_service ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, type, code, is_pay, receive_type_id, receive_date, receivable, discount, received, payment_times, amount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, mara_id, adviser_id, official_id, remarks) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{type}, #{code}, #{isPay}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate}, #{receivable}, #{discount}, #{received}, #{paymentTimes}, #{amount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{maraId}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, #{remarks});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS GmtCreate, type, code, is_pay AS isPay, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, receivable, discount, received, payment_times AS paymentTimes, amount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, mara_id AS maraId, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, remarks FROM b_service WHERE is_delete = 0 ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS GmtCreate, type, code, is_pay AS isPay, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, receivable, discount, received, payment_times AS paymentTimes, amount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, mara_id AS maraId, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, remarks FROM b_service WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
